verses.verse: And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H622>Gather<s%> yourselves together, that I may <S%H5046>tell<s%> you that <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H7122>befall<s%> you in the <S%H319>last<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
<S%H6908>Gather<s%> yourselves together, and <S%H8085>hear,<s%> you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> and <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> your <S%H1>father.<s%>

<S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> you are my <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> my <S%H3581>might,<s%> and the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of my <S%H202>strength,<s%> the <S%H3499>excellency<s%> of <S%H7613>dignity,<s%> and the <S%H3499>excellency<s%> of <S%H5794>power:<s%>

<S%H6349>Unstable<s%> as <S%H4325>water,<s%> you shall not <S%H3498>excel;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you <S%H5927>went<s%> up to your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H4904>bed;<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H2490>defiled<s%> you it: he <S%H5927>went<s%> up to my <S%H3326>couch.<s%>
<S%H8095>Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi<s%> are <S%H251>brothers;<s%> <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H2555>cruelty<s%> are in their <S%H4380>habitations.<s%>

O my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> not you into their <S%H5475>secret;<s%> to their <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> my <S%H3519>honor,<s%> be not you <S%H3161>united:<s%> for in their <S%H639>anger<s%> they <S%H2026>slew<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> and in their <S%H7522>self-will<s%> they <S%H6131>dig<s%> <S%H6131>down<s%> a <S%H7794>wall.<s%>

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be their <S%H639>anger,<s%> for it was <S%H5794>fierce;<s%> and their <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> for it was <S%H7185>cruel:<s%> I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> them in <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah,<s%> you are he whom your <S%H251>brothers<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise:<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be in the <S%H6203>neck<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies;<s%> your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> before you.

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> is a <S%H738>lion's<s%> <S%H1482>whelp:<s%> from the <S%H2964>prey,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> you are <S%H5927>gone<s%> up: he <S%H3766>stooped<s%> down, he <S%H7257>couched<s%> as a <S%H738>lion,<s%> and as an <S%H3833>old<s%> <S%H3833>lion;<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H6965>rouse<s%> him up?

The <S%H7626>scepter<s%> shall not <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> nor a <S%H2710>lawgiver<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7886>Shiloh<s%> <S%H935>come;<s%> and to him shall the <S%H3349>gathering<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> be.

<S%H631>Binding<s%> his <S%H5895>foal<s%> to the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> and his <S%H860>ass's<s%> <S%H1121>colt<s%> to the <S%H8321>choice<s%> <S%H8321>vine;<s%> he <S%H3526>washed<s%> his <S%H3830>garments<s%> in <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and his <S%H5497>clothes<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes:<s%>
His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be <S%H2447>red<s%> with <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and his <S%H8127>teeth<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> with <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

<S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> at the <S%H2348>haven<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and he shall be for an <S%H2348>haven<s%> of <S%H591>ships;<s%> and his <S%H3411>border<s%> shall be to <S%H6721>Zidon.<s%>
<S%H3485>Issachar<s%> is a <S%H1634>strong<s%> <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H7257>couching<s%> down <S%H996>between<s%> two <S%H4942>burdens:<s%>

And he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H4496>rest<s%> was <S%H2896>good,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> that it was <S%H5276>pleasant;<s%> and <S%H5186>bowed<s%> his <S%H7926>shoulder<s%> to <S%H5445>bear,<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H5647>servant<s%> to <S%H4522>tribute.<s%>
<S%H1835>Dan<s%> shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H1835>Dan<s%> shall be a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> an <S%H8207>adder<s%> in the <S%H734>path,<s%> that <S%H5391>bites<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H6119>heels,<s%> so that his <S%H7392>rider<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H268>backward.<s%>
I have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for your <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H1410>Gad,<s%> a <S%H1416>troop<s%> shall <S%H1464>overcome<s%> him: but he shall <S%H1464>overcome<s%> at the <S%H6119>last.<s%>
Out of <S%H836>Asher<s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> shall be <S%H8082>fat,<s%> and he shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> <S%H4428>royal<s%> <S%H4574>dainties.<s%>
<S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> is a <S%H355>hind<s%> let <S%H7971>loose:<s%> he <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H8233>goodly<s%> <S%H561>words.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> is a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1121>bough,<s%> even a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1121>bough<s%> by a <S%H5869>well;<s%> whose <S%H1121>branches<s%> <S%H6805>run<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H7791>wall:<s%>
The <S%H1167>archers<s%> <S%H2671><s%> have <S%H4843>sorely<s%> <S%H4843>grieved<s%> him, and <S%H7232>shot<s%> at him, and <S%H7852>hated<s%> him:

But his <S%H7198>bow<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in <S%H386>strength,<s%> and the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> were made <S%H6339>strong<s%> by the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H46>mighty<s%> God of <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> (from <S%H8033>there<s%> is the <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>)

Even by the <S%H410>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> who shall <S%H5826>help<s%> you; and by the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> who shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> you with <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H5921>above,<s%> <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> that <S%H7257>lies<s%> <S%H8478>under,<s%> <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of the <S%H7699>breasts,<s%> and of the <S%H7356>womb:<s%>

The <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%> have <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of my <S%H2029>progenitors<s%> to the utmost <S%H8379>bound<s%> of the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1389>hills:<s%> they shall be on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and on the <S%H6936>crown<s%> of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of him that was <S%H5139>separate<s%> from his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

<S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> shall <S%H2963>shred<s%> as a <S%H2061>wolf:<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> he shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H5706>prey,<s%> and at <S%H6153>night<s%> he shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> is it that their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them; every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H834>according<s%> to his <S%H1293>blessing<s%> he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them.

And he <S%H6680>charged<s%> them, and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, I am to be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to my <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H6912>bury<s%> me with my <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%>

In the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> with the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a burial <S%H6913>plot.<s%>

<S%H8033>There<s%> they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife;<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H802>wife;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> I <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H3812>Leah.<s%>
The <S%H4735>purchase<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> and of the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is therein was from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth.<s%>

And when <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H6680>commanding<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> he <S%H622>gathered<s%> up his <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and <S%H1478>yielded<s%> up the <S%H1478>ghost,<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
